TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WasHostedComPlusFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase

Docs.summary: Creates a service host for a Web-hosted COM+ component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This type supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] hosting infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase CreateServiceHost (string constructorString, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase CreateServiceHost(string constructorString, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the Web host parameters.
An array of URIs for which the object is to be created.
Docs.summary: Creates a service host for the specified URI.
Docs.returns: A object that contains the service host for the specified URI.
